item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 17 Oct 2023
item.description:
1. Hiring Functional Software Engineers (OCaml or Haskell) in Paris, France!
  2. OCaml Hacking Day at Tarides Chennai
  3. qcheck-lin and qcheck-stm 0.2
  4. dune 3.11.0
  5. runtime_events_tools 0.5.0
  6. Gospel 0.2.0
  7. Talk about declarative rhythm-machines with ~Fry~ and FRP @ Copenhagen
  8. Deprecating ocaml-migrate-parsetree in favor of Ppxlib, also as a Platform tool
